sentences.sentence: As illustration, these models are applied to an attitude control dynamics simulation of a three-axis stability satellite and the corresponding toques were plotted in curves.
sentences.translation: 为验证模型有效性，将其应用于某三轴稳定对地定向卫星姿态动力学仿真中，得到了相应的太阳光压干扰力矩曲线。

sentences.sentence: In rock drilling process with percussion-rotary drill rotating drilling tool bears two toques: dynamic torque which drives drilling tool into rock mass, and resistance torque of rock mass.
sentences.translation: 前言：在冲击—回转式凿岩机向岩石钻进过程中，旋转中的钻具承受着两种力矩的作用：一是驱动其旋转的动力矩；二是被钻岩石阻止其旋转的阻力矩。
